content.text: Hey! I'm a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes. I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her. I love to read and cook. I used to be a nurse. What about you?

Hi! I'm a writer who rides my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus. I spent more time climbing since I quit my job. My dream is to open a restaurant and share my love of food with others. I listen to Katie Perry while in the shower and I have 10 alpacas.
Wow! That's so cool. I love to read and cook too. I'm a big fan of Katie Perry. Have you ever listened to her album Teenage Dream? I think it's amazing.
Yes, I have. I love that album! It's so catchy. I also love her songs Firework and Dark Horse.
Those are my favorites too! I love her music so much.
Me too. She's an amazing artist.
Do you have a favorite book?
Yes, I do. My favorite book is The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald.
That's a great book! I love it too.
I know, right? It's so well written.
It is. I love the characters and the story.
Me too. It's a classic for a reason.
Definitely. It's one of my favorite books of all time.
